name: Ponge
description:
Player 1 - W and S to move up and down.

Player 2 - Arrow Keys to move up and down.

Press Spacebar to start.

The first to 11 wins!

Today I remade Pong from scratch because I felt like it. I'm posting it here to show it to my friends. Hopefully it can bring you 30 seconds (or more!) of fun. Sound doesn't work in HTML but works great elsewhere.
